pr_title: GEODE-8538: Create test to validate ordering of redis pipeline commands

timeline.bodyText: NUMBER_OF_COMMAND_IN_PIPELINE looks like a constant, but isn't. It should be something like "numberOfCommands" or "numberOfCommandsInPipeline".
timeline.author: ringles
